newsitem.title: CHINA: China's Heilongjiang grain output hits record.
newsitem.headline: China's Heilongjiang grain output hits record.

text.p: China's northeastern province of Heilongjiang produced a record 30 million tonnes of grain this year, up more than four million tonnes from last year, the People's Daily said on Thursday.
Investment in agriculture jumped 14 percent in 1996 to 11.5 billion yuan ($1.4 million) from last year, with farmers using more fertiliser, the newspaper said.

Land under rice and corn increased by 12.9 percent and 33 percent this year to 2.71 million hectares and 1.1 million hectares respectively from last year, the newspaper said. It gave no further details.
